newcandy documentation
======================

Documentation for the NEWCANDY software for modeling grain growth, dynamics, and chemistry within a protoplanetary disk.

Read the README below or see documentation for the chemdiff module

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   readme
   modules
